name: Vision Of The Double
description:
Original made 2016, acrylic on canvas,128 * 90 cm.

This work is dedicated to the concept of the Double as a Dream Body. This concept refers to the foundations of the practice of lucid dreaming as formulated by the Toltecs and Incas.

In technical terms, the work was done in an analogous way using an airbrush, liquid acrylic and industrial alcohol.
The sketch for the painting was made on a computer. All digital effects are created in editors and then reproduced with paints on canvas.
